branchCategory.name: FGA
branchCategory.description: <p>Suitable for high flow rate filtration, the FGA industrial filter series can be used for a wide range of applications.  The series offers a variety of elements that can be selected according to the filtration conditions.  Vertical structure of the FGA allows little loss of filtrate.</p>
